item.title: Seed Picking - Like P Hacking only More Random
item.description: Recently I was trying to illustrate random number generation and confidence intervals. In particular, I wanted to show that sometimes by chance our confidence bands donâ€™t contain the true value of a parameter. I ended up with this example of of a measurement of a median where the underlying distribution has a median of 4 yet for this one sample of 1000 points, the 95% confidence interval is 4.28 to 5.
